title: When You’re Raring to Go
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Hey, You-chan. Do you want to analyze our previous live’s video so we can power up our next one?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>You’re so fired up huh, Chika-chan~. Let’s watch it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Yeah! Ah, but…. Last live was just too much fun, I’m not sure I’ll be able to hold back and just watch<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>That’s true….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Maybe it’s better if we exercise a bit first? Should we go for a run now?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>No, stop, Chika-chan~! You need save that itch to power up our next live<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I-, it hurts, You-chan….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Wawaa, sorry! Hehe, I guess I also have too much energy….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I want to watch it so we can learn from it, but it just makes you want to run, huh…. That’s right! Let’s just hold hands and stop each other!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ahaha, that would be reassuring! Alright, let’s analyze it thoroughly and consult our training plan with everyone else too after this!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
